entity.name: molecule
entity.query: select * from molecule_denormalized

entity.name: syn_rc
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='RESEARCH_CODE' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_atc
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='ATC' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_ban
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='BAN' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_dcf
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='DCF' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_e
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='E_NUMBER' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_fda
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='FDA' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_inn
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='INN' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_jan
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='JAN' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_merck
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='MERCK_INDEX' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_nf
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='NATIONAL_FORMULARY' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_other
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='OTHER' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_sys
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='SYSTEMATIC' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_trade
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='TRADE_NAME' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_usan
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='USAN' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: syn_usp
entity.query: select synonyms from molecule_synonyms where syn_type='USP' and molregno='${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_glaxo
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 1 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_dundee
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 2 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_bms
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 3 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_pains
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 4 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_surechembl
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 5 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_mlsmr
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 6 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_inpharmatica
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 7 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'

entity.name: alert_lint
entity.query: SELECT alert_name FROM compound_structural_alerts csa JOIN structural_alerts sa ON (sa.alert_id = csa.alert_id) WHERE sa.alert_set_id = 8 AND csa.molregno = '${molecule.molregno}'
